name: Rolando Daniel GARCIA-HERNANDEZ, aka Rolando Daniel-Garcia, aka Rolando Daniel Hernandez Garcia, aka Rolando Hernandez-Garcia, aka Rolando Daniel H. Garcia, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES; and Mario Delgado Cruz, aka Mario Delgado, aka Mario Cruz Delgado, aka Daniel Delgado, aka Mario Cruz-Delgado, petitioner, v. United States.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Rolando Daniel GARCIA-HERNANDEZ, aka Rolando Daniel-Garcia, aka Rolando Daniel Hernandez Garcia, aka Rolando Hernandez-Garcia, aka Rolando Daniel H. Garcia, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES; and Mario Delgado Cruz, aka Mario Delgado, aka Mario Cruz Delgado, aka Daniel Delgado, aka Mario Cruz-Delgado, petitioner,
v.
United States.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Sessions v. Dimaya, 584 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 1204, 200 L.Ed.2d 549 (2018).
casebody.head_matter:
Rolando Daniel GARCIA-HERNANDEZ, aka Rolando Daniel-Garcia, aka Rolando Daniel Hernandez Garcia, aka Rolando Hernandez-Garcia, aka Rolando Daniel H. Garcia, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES; and Mario Delgado Cruz, aka Mario Delgado, aka Mario Cruz Delgado, aka Daniel Delgado, aka Mario Cruz-Delgado, petitioner,
v.
United States.
No. 17-5305.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 14, 2018.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Sessions v. Dimaya, 584 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 1204, 200 L.Ed.2d 549 (2018).
